sections.heading: Office;
sections.text:
hours to remain open; exception; penalties; attendance at meetings of board of

county commissioners and at county seat in certain counties.

sections.heading: Filling
sections.text: of vacancy in office; temporary disablement.

sections.heading: Appointment
sections.text: of attorney if district attorney unable or fails to act; deduction from salary.

sections.heading: District
sections.text:
attorney or partner not to appear as or assist counsel against State or county;

penalty.

sections.heading: Receipts
sections.text: for money or property received in official capacity.

sections.heading: Accounting
sections.text: and payment of money to county treasurer.

sections.heading: Action
sections.text: by county treasurer when district attorney fails to account.

sections.heading: Rendition
sections.text: of legal opinions to county, township and district officers.

sections.heading: Attendance
sections.text: at certain meetings of board of county commissioners; duties.

sections.heading: Restrictions
sections.text: on presentation of claims against county.

sections.heading: Penalty
sections.text: for malfeasance in office or neglect of duty.
